structure.unit: Chapter 26 PARK AND RECREATION DEPARTMENT RULES AND REGULATIONS

text.section:
Sec. 26-32. Training.
All selected Programming Partners must participate in a mandatory training program, that will include, but not be limited to: department rules and regulations; ethics in the public sector; officials education and conduct; coaching certification; parental codes of conduct; inclusiveness and sensitivity for persons with disabilities; record keeping and reporting; and, facility stewardship.
